medium: Ink and colors on gold-flecked paper
title: Landscape with Fishermen on a Boat
marks: Inscription; Signature; Stamps artist\'s signature, seal and inscription, at URC
description: fan mounted as an album leaf; screen divided in two areas; right, water with a bridge over a narrow place in the water and two fishermen in a boat in foreground; left, mountainous area structures and low hanging trees in the foreground
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
